text: visvasavantayini! oba allahta udav karannan bavata pat vanu. maryamge put isa (tamange) golayinta “allah venuven mata udav karanna kavarekda?”yi vimasu avasthavedi “api allah venuven udav karannemu” yayi ema golayin pævasu andamatama (visvasavantayini! obat allahta udav karannan bavata pat vanu). ehet israyila paramparave daruvangen ek (kuda) samuhayakma (ohuva) visvasa kalaha. anit (visala) samuhayak (ohuva) pratiksepa kalaha. ebævin visvasa kala ovunta ovunge saturan kerehi (jayagrahanaya kirimata) apima udav kalemu. ebævin ovun jayagrahanaya kalaha
